languages.text: "Охотник? Увечный охотник?" {n}Паскаль требовательно кладет клешню мехадендрита на плечо Авеля и тем добивается утвердительного кивка.{/n} "Увечный охотник. Данная персонификация фигурировала в данных, расшифрованных мной. К сожалению, объем информации о ней близок к нулю".

"The hunter? The Maimed Hunter?" {n}Pasqal places a mechadendrite claw on Abel's shoulder, demanding an answer. Abel nods.{/n} "The Maimed Hunter. That persona occurred in the data I decrypted. Unfortunately, the sum total of information on it is very near zero."
languages.original_text: "Охотник? Увечный охотник?" {n}Паскаль требовательно кладет клешню мехадендрита на плечо Авеля и тем добивается утвердительного кивка.{/n} "Увечный охотник. Данная персонификация фигурировала в данных, расшифрованных мной. К сожалению, объем информации о ней близок к нулю".

traits.locale_text: "The hunter? The Maimed Hunter?" {n}Pasqal lays his mechadendrite's claw on Abel's shoulder, demanding an answer. Abel nods.{/n} "The Maimed Hunter. That personified reference occurred in the data I decrypted. Unfortunately, the sum total of information on it is very near zero."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「ハンターですか？負傷したハンター？」{n}パスカルは機械触手の爪をアベルの肩に置いて答えを求める。アベルはうなずいた。{/n}「負傷したハンターです。あの人物は自分が解読したデータに載っていました。残念ながら、情報の総数はほぼゼロと言っていい」
languages.original_text: "The hunter? The Maimed Hunter?" {n}Pasqal places a mechadendrite claw on Abel's shoulder, demanding an answer. Abel nods.{/n} "The Maimed Hunter. That persona occurred in the data I decrypted. Unfortunately, the sum total of information on it is very near zero."

traits.locale_text: 「ハンターですか？負傷したハンター？」{n}パスカルは機械触手の爪をアベルの肩に置いて答えを求める。アベルはうなずいた。{/n}「負傷したハンターです。あの人物は自分が解読したデータに載っていました。残念ながら、情報の総数はほぼゼロと言っていい」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “猎手？你是指‘残损猎手’吗？”{n}帕斯卡将机械触须搭在亚伯的肩上，请求他解释。亚伯点了点头。{/n}“是的，残损猎手。我从破译数据中发现了这一存在。但不幸的是，关于它的信息总量几近为零。”
languages.original_text: "The hunter? The Maimed Hunter?" {n}Pasqal places a mechadendrite claw on Abel's shoulder, demanding an answer. Abel nods.{/n} "The Maimed Hunter. That persona occurred in the data I decrypted. Unfortunately, the sum total of information on it is very near zero."

traits.locale_text: “猎手？你是指‘残损猎手’吗？”{n}帕斯卡将机械触须搭在亚伯的肩上，请求他解释。亚伯点了点头。{/n}“是的，残损猎手。我从破译数据中发现了这一存在。但不幸的是，关于它的信息总量几近为零。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Un chasseur ? Le Chasseur mutilé ? » {n}Pasqal place une griffe de mécadendrite sur l'épaule d'Abel pour lui signifier de répondre. Abel acquiesce.{/n} « Le Chasseur mutilé. Cette entité était mentionnée dans les données que j'ai décryptées. Malheureusement, la somme des informations qui le concernent est proche de zéro. »
languages.original_text: "The hunter? The Maimed Hunter?" {n}Pasqal places a mechadendrite claw on Abel's shoulder, demanding an answer. Abel nods.{/n} "The Maimed Hunter. That persona occurred in the data I decrypted. Unfortunately, the sum total of information on it is very near zero."

traits.locale_text: « Un chasseur ? Le Chasseur mutilé ? » {n}Pasqal place une griffe de mécadendrite sur l'épaule d'Abel pour lui signifier de répondre. Abel acquiesce.{/n} « Le Chasseur mutilé. Cette entité était mentionnée dans les données que j'ai décryptées. Malheureusement, la somme des informations qui le concernent est proche de zéro. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «¿El cazador? ¿El Cazador Lisiado?». {n}Pasqal coloca una garra de mecadendrita en el hombro de Abel, instándolo a que responda. Abel asiente.{/n} «El Cazador Lisiado. Esa persona apareció en los datos que desencripté, pero la suma total de la información sobre él es prácticamente cero».
languages.original_text: "The hunter? The Maimed Hunter?" {n}Pasqal places a mechadendrite claw on Abel's shoulder, demanding an answer. Abel nods.{/n} "The Maimed Hunter. That persona occurred in the data I decrypted. Unfortunately, the sum total of information on it is very near zero."

traits.locale_text: «¿El cazador? ¿El Cazador Lisiado?». {n}Pasqal coloca una garra de mecadendrita en el hombro de Abel, instándolo a que responda. Abel asiente.{/n} «El Cazador Lisiado. Esa persona apareció en los datos que desencripté, pero la suma total de la información sobre él es prácticamente cero».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Hunter? Der Verstümmelte Hunter?" {n}Pasqal legt eine Mechadendriten-Klaue auf Abels Schulter, er verlangt eine Antwort. Abel nickt.{/n} "Der Verstümmelte Hunter. Diese Persona trat in den von mir verschlüsselten Daten in Erscheinung. Unglücklicherweise ist die Summe der zu ihr verfügbaren Informationen annähernd null."
languages.original_text: "The hunter? The Maimed Hunter?" {n}Pasqal places a mechadendrite claw on Abel's shoulder, demanding an answer. Abel nods.{/n} "The Maimed Hunter. That persona occurred in the data I decrypted. Unfortunately, the sum total of information on it is very near zero."

traits.locale_text: "Der Hunter? Der Verstümmelte Hunter?" {n}Pasqal legt eine Mechadendriten-Klaue auf Abels Schulter, er verlangt eine Antwort. Abel nickt.{/n} "Der Verstümmelte Hunter. Diese Persona trat in den von mir verschlüsselten Daten in Erscheinung. Unglücklicherweise ist die Summe der zu ihr verfügbaren Informationen annähernd null."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Avcı mı? Yaralı Avcı mı?" {n}Pasqal, mekadentrit pençelerinden birini Abel'in omzuna koyup yanıt talep ediyor. Abel, onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Yaralı Avcı. Çözdüğüm veriler içinde denk geldiğim bir kişilik. Ne yazık ki hakkındaki enformasyon toplamı sıfıra oldukça yakın."
languages.original_text: "The hunter? The Maimed Hunter?" {n}Pasqal places a mechadendrite claw on Abel's shoulder, demanding an answer. Abel nods.{/n} "The Maimed Hunter. That persona occurred in the data I decrypted. Unfortunately, the sum total of information on it is very near zero."

traits.locale_text: "Avcı mı? Yaralı Avcı mı?" {n}Pasqal, mekadentrit pençelerinden birini Abel'in omzuna koyuyor ve bir yanıt talep ediyor. Abel onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor.{/n} "Yaralı Avcı. Çözdüğüm verilerin içinde bu kişiliğe denk gelmiştim. Ne yazık ki hakkındaki enformansyon toplamı sıfıra oldukça yakın."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
